document.full_text: tornadoes caused widespread damage in alabama's jefferson county, which is struggling to refinance a $3.2 billion debt, but there were no estimates of cost yet, officials said on thursday.
document.title: damage widespread in alabama's jefferson county
lines_and_colors: tornadoes caused widespread damage in alabama's jefferson county, which is struggling to refinance a $3.2 billion debt, but there were no estimates of cost yet, officials said on thursday.
